text: Niki Taylor (born March 5, 1975 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida) is an American model and was shown on multiple magazine covers, such as Sports Illustrated. She is also associated with cosmetics, including but not limited to CoverGirl. In 2001, she was almost killed because of a car accident, but has continued to model in spite of that accident. ==References== Category:Models from Florida Category:People from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:1975 births Category:Living people
title: Niki Taylor
